name: Full Pawer
description:
Lead, Create, Explore: Full Pawer is a top-down sandbox RTS where you play the role as a powerful Devine with the ability to shape the world. Use your powers to lead followers to glorious battles and valuable minerals. Create lush forests, savannas, grasslands filled with many unique creatures. Explore the lost lands of Plystia and discover the hidden treasures and evil that they hold.

- Explore dozens of lost islands
- Build up a mighty village
- Create lush and thriving biomes
- Unlock tons of bizarre creatures, plants, and abilities
- Discover the dark history of Plystia in a dynamic campaign adventure!
